meanings.definition: A person who raises or cultivates crops.
meanings.sent1: The croppers worked hard in the fields to grow healthy crops.
meanings.sent2: The farmers relied on the croppers to tend to the plants and harvest the produce.
meanings.sent3: The croppers decided to have a race to see who could grow the tallest sunflower.
meanings.sent4: As the backbone of the farm, the croppers stood tall amidst the golden fields.
meanings.sent5: Under the bright sun, the croppers toiled day in and day out to ensure a bountiful harvest.

meanings.definition: A machine used for cutting crops.
meanings.sent1: The old croppers in the shed were still functional and ready for harvest season.
meanings.sent2: The farmer used the croppers to efficiently gather the ripe wheat from the fields.
meanings.sent3: The croppers seemed to have a mind of their own, zipping through the rows of corn.
meanings.sent4: With a loud roar, the croppers sliced through the wheat like a hungry beast.
meanings.sent5: The shiny blades of the croppers gleamed in the sunlight as they worked tirelessly in the fields.
